column1: Smoque BBQ////The way Smoque distinguishes itself can be felt through their brisket. While most brisket is either 1.) bland or 2.) drowned in sauce to replace flavor
column2: Smoque manages to cultivate flavor organically through their cooking process. Their cooking process leaves a delightfully smokey flavor
column3: and a moistness that is unmatched anywhere else in Chicago. Overall
column4: Smoque is a great value for its slightly high price.
